item.title: ウィキメディアは、オンライン安全法案に基づく英国の読者や貢献者の年齢チェックに応じず、最小限のデータを収集するという財団の公約を理由にする（BBC）
item.description:
BBC:
Wikimedia won't comply with age checks of UK readers or contributors under the Online Safety Bill, citing the foundation's commitment to collect minimal data  —  Wikipedia will not comply with any age checks required under the Online Safety Bill, its foundation says.

item.title: Advertising Association/WARC: 2022年の英国の広告費は前年比8.8%増の£348B、ニュース・雑誌は前年比1%減の£188B、うちオンラインは2%増の937M（Aisha Majid/Press Gazette)
item.description:
Aisha Majid / Press Gazette:
Advertising Association/WARC: UK ad spend grew 8.8% YoY to £34.8B in 2022 and fell 1% YoY to £1.88B across news and magazines, of which £937M was online, up 2%  —  AA/WARC data reveals overall UK ad spend grew in 2022 although spending on news fell slightly.

item.title: ジャーナリズムやその視聴者、ファクトチェックなどに関する学術研究にスポットを当てたニュースレター「RQ1」に関するマーク・コディントンとセス・ルイスのQ&A（Angie Drobnic Holan/Nieman Lab）
item.description:

Q&A with Mark Coddington and Seth Lewis about RQ1, their newsletter spotlighting academic research about journalism, its audience, fact-checking, and more  —  “It's the inherent instability in the space that makes it so fascinating to many researchers.”

item.title: NBAのフェニックス・サンズがGray Televisionと放送契約を、Kisweとストリーミング契約を結び、旧RSNの3倍となる2.8M+世帯に試合を届ける（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
The NBA's Phoenix Suns sign a broadcast deal with Gray Television and a streaming deal with Kiswe, bringing the games to 2.8M+ households, triple the old RSN  —  All local Suns and Mercury games will air on broadcast TV, with a paid streaming option for cord-cutters.

item.title: Sinclair Broadcast Groupは、ToledoのWNWOとSouthern OregonのKTVLのローカルニュース番組をThe National Deskに置き換え、ニュースルーム全体をレイオフする（Matthew Keys/The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Sinclair Broadcast Group is replacing local newscasts at Toledo's WNWO and Southern Oregon's KTVL with The National Desk, and laying off their entire newsrooms  —  Sinclair Broadcast Group is pulling local news from its Toledo NBC affiliate, a move that was described as a way to “ensure our long-term success.”

item.title: ソニー・ピクチャーズ、2022年度営業利益は前年比45％減の〜894Mドル、売上高は〜851Mドル、第4四半期は売上高〜271Bドル、営業利益は前年比40％増の〜119Mドル（Gavin J Blair/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Gavin J Blair / The Hollywood Reporter:
Sony Pictures reports FY 2022 operating income down 45% YoY to ~$894M, revenue down by ~$851M, and Q4 operating income up 40% YoY to ~$119M on ~$2.71B revenue  —  Sony's movie division was hurt by a lack of big hits and one-off gains, while music and sensors businesses continue to thrive.

item.title: リチャード・シャープは、ボリス・ジョンソンの融資を手助けした役割や、ゲイリー・リネカー問題への対応について、数ヶ月の間に圧力を受け、BBC委員長を辞任した（Jim Waterson/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
Richard Sharp resigns as BBC chair after months of mounting pressure over his role in helping Boris Johnson get a loan and his handling of the Gary Lineker row  —  Investigation says Sharp broke rules on public appointments, creating ‘potential perceived conflict of interest’
